snippet: “Joseph Roth: A Life in Letters” fills in some of the blanks in the troubled and abbreviated life of this prominent 20th-century German-language writer.
abstract: Larry Rohter reviews book Joseph Roth: A Life in Letters, translated and edited by Michael Hofmann.
lead_paragraph: “Joseph Roth: A Life in Letters” fills in some of the blanks in the troubled and abbreviated life of this prominent 20th-century German-language writer.

headline.seo: ‘Joseph Roth: A Life in Letters,’ Edited by Michael Hofmann
headline.main: A Rootless Writer, Anchored by Woe
headline.print_headline: A Rootless Writer, Anchored by Woe
